channel.title: Introduction :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: Content Note Much of the content in this chapter was adapted from Nathan Bean’s CIS 400 course at K-State, with the author’s permission. That content is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA license. A critical part of the software development process is ensuring the software works! We mentioned earlier that it is possible to logically prove that software works by constructing a state transition table for the program, but once a program reaches a certain size, this strategy becomes less feasible.
